dcterms:creator: H. Hu
S. Dong
Y. Zhao
D. Lian
Z. Li
S. Gao
dcterms:description: The RepCount dataset provides fine-grained annotations in the form of start and end of actions, covering a large number of video length variations and containing anomaly cases, making it more challenging than other datasets.
dcterms:title: RepCount

dcterms:creator: D. Dwibedi
Y. Aytar
J. Tompson
P. Sermanet
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The QUVA dataset is composed of 100 videos for testing with a wide range of repetitions, where each video contains an average of 12.5 action cycles. It includes action videos in realistic scenarios with occlusion, changes in viewpoint, and inconsistency in action cycles.
dcterms:title: QUVA

dcterms:creator: H. Zhang
X. Xu
G. Han
S. He
dcterms:description: The UCFRep dataset contains 526 repetitive action videos collected from the UCF101 dataset, which is an action recognition dataset classified into 101 action categories.
dcterms:title: UCFRep
